page_content: The page contains various announcements and updates from the government of the Canton of Bern, including topics like elections, healthcare, and education.
The page discusses tax deductions related to work expenses, including costs for computers and software used primarily for professional purposes.
The page provides information for service providers and service recipients in the context of child welfare and protection.
The page provides a step-by-step guide on how to set up two-factor authentication on a new smartphone or tablet.
The page discusses the survey of undeveloped building zones based on cantonal guidelines and provides technical guidance for the process.
The page offers films and resources for students transitioning to secondary level II, focusing on career choices and educational practices.
The page features an interview with Donatella Pulitano, a terminologist, discussing her work in terminology and language technologies.
The page discusses the traditional craft of hand-weaving aprons and other items for Bernese costumes, offering courses at Inforama Berner Oberland in Hondrich.
The content of the page could not be retrieved.
The page discusses self-preparedness for emergencies, including the importance of having a stockpile of food, water, and other essentials.

The page contains various announcements from the government of the Canton of Bern, including a section discussing a supplementary credit for the completion of a school administration software project for secondary schools.
The page discusses the reimbursement of costs for internal school training, including digital training tools and software for educational purposes.
The page discusses the use of electronic methods for submitting salary statements, mentioning the use of a specific software program eLohnausweis SSK for this purpose.
The page provides legal information and data protection guidelines, including the use of cookies and analytics tools for website optimization.
